title: Craving Beauty / His Wedding Night Wager
description: CRAVING BEAUTY by Nalini SinghBrooding entrepreneur Marc Bordeaux was dangerous to her in the way that only a strong sexy male could be to a woman. But even knowing that, Hira agreed to marry him, risking everything for his heart.HIS WEDDING-NIGHT WAGER by Katherine GarberaHayden MacKenzie wanted the wedding night he'd lost with Shelby Paxton. Ten years ago she'd been paid a fortune to jilt the casino owner and now she was being blackmailed into seeing him again, but she didn't plan on falling for her first love a second time!
author: Carla Cassidy
